system.description: When the character strikes with righteous fury and great skill, their critical blows are especially devastating.
system.benefit: When the character inflicts Righteous Fury with an Attack or Psychic Power that they achieved 3+ Degrees of Success on the Test for, they roll twice to etermine the amount of Critical damage inflicted with Righteous Fury, and take the higher result.

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Righteous Fury
specialAbilities.description: When you inflict Righteous Fury with 3+ Degrees of Success, roll twice for Critical damage and take the higher result.
